dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
Apache Avro is a data serialization system. Note: lang/py3 version (this
package) will be deprecated and lang/py functions will be made available
for both python2 and python3.
dependent_to.name: py-avro-python3

dependent_to.description: py.test plugin to check import ordering using isort
dependent_to.name: py-pytest-isort

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description:
TorchGeo: datasets, samplers, transforms, and pre-trained models for
geospatial data.
dependent_to.name: py-torchgeo

dependent_to.description:
Spack is a multi-platform package manager that builds and installs
multiple versions and configurations of software. It works on Linux,
macOS, and many supercomputers. Spack is non-destructive: installing a
new version of a package does not break existing installations, so many
configurations of the same package can coexist.
dependent_to.name: spack

description: A Python utility / library to sort Python imports.
name: py-isort

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
